definition: to ask about/to make some inquiries/to ask around
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
dozen (loanword)
to listen/to hear/to obey/a can (loanword from English "tin")/classifier for canned beverages
smile (archaic)
(literary pronunciation, still advocated in Taiwan) to rule/to sentence/to allow

sentences.english: Those busybodies always seemed to have some-thing to gossip about.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉是个好管闲事的人，老是打听别人的事。

sentences.english: I will ask around and see if anyone can help.
sentences.chinese: 我要四处打听一下，看有没有人能够帮忙。

sentences.english: The carline is fond of prying into others's things.
sentences.chinese: 这位老太婆爱打听别人家的事。

sentences.english: Sechang go, show good notice spirit inquire of front of vibration.
sentences.chinese: 世昌不知所终，展良通知巧灵向振锋打听。

sentences.english: She often inquires of me about your father.
sentences.chinese: 她常常向我打听你的父亲的情况。

sentences.english: He was also not much ceremonious, returned apt ugg then hurriedly let the matchmaker base out.
sentences.chinese: 他也不多客套，回去就赶紧让媒婆打听了。

sentences.english: I started asking acquaintances if anyone was looking for a good sushi chef.
sentences.chinese: 我开始向熟人打听是否有人需要一个优秀的寿司主厨。

sentences.english: Desdemona. Can you inquire him out, and be edified by report?
sentences.chinese: 苔丝狄蒙娜你可以打听打听他在什么地方呀。

sentences.english: Desdemona. Can you inquire him out, and be edified by report?
sentences.chinese: 苔丝狄蒙娜你可以打听打听他在什么地方呀。

sentences.english: I'll telephone him and ask him to go there to inquire about it.
sentences.chinese: 我可以打电话给他请他去剧院打听一下。

sentences.english: I'll inquire about the price of the tickets.
The porter and I looked at each other and smiled.
sentences.chinese: 我不认去留馆的路，就像一个搬运工打听。

sentences.english: And of everything that he met he made inquiry if perchance they had seen his mother.
sentences.chinese: 他向一路上遇到的所有人打听是否遇见过他的妈妈。

sentences.english: Iwould like to know whether I can cash a cheque here.
sentences.chinese: 我想认识打听我能否在这兑换支票。

sentences.english: You can ask all the sec 1 students, now all their classes have been changed to self-revision.
sentences.chinese: 你可以打听一下初一年级的学生，他们的课都自习了。

sentences.english: I enquired at the porters' lodge. A middle-aged man with a kindly face came forward.
sentences.chinese: 我到门房去打听，一位和蔼善良的中年人走上前来。
